title: First-Ever Game Jam
summary: How I make a game with zero experience
content: A few weeks ago, I took on a challenge I had never faced before â€” participating in my first-ever game jam. With just 36 hours to brainstorm, design, and develop a complete game, I knew it would be an intense experience. As someone who has struggled with coming up with game ideas in the past, I was both excited and nervous about how things would turn out. Would my team and I be able to pull something off in such a short time? Or would we crash and burn under the pressure?
